QuestData.Title: The Witchqueen
QuestData.Description: The time has come to assault High Crawliac, the Witchqueen.$b$BYou should know that one does not become queen of the harpies through kindness.$b$bThis creature has killed, betrayed, and tormented countless tauren, harpies, kobolds, and anything else she had to in order to secure her position as queen.$b$bCome, friend, let us finish this.
QuestData.RewardText: You have our respect and honor, $p. I name you Skyfriend, and grant you free passage through our lands at your discretion.
